articles.title: WATCH: Marcus Stoinis' self-praise leaves Glenn Maxwell in splits during BBL post-match interview - Times Now
articles.description: Marcus Stoinis' response to Glenn Maxwell's sensational 64-ball 154 in the Big Bash League (BBL) left the latter in splits as Stoinis heaped praise on his own knock.
articles.content:
• Glenn Maxwell created history in the Big Bash League against Hobart Hurricanes
  • Maxwell smashed 154 off just 64 balls to break Marcus Stoinis' previous record
